thread.title: Fed’s Evans: Fed Can Raise Rates Gradually

author: Shayndi Raice
title: Fed’s Evans: Fed Can Raise Rates Gradually
text:
CHICAGO—Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Charles Evans said low inflation means the central bank can gradually raise interest rates.
“I don’t foresee an outsized risk of a break out in inflation,” said Mr. Evans in prepared remarks Tuesday. “As long as this picture continues, the [Federal Open Market Committee] can increase rates gradually while monitoring any rising inflationary pressures.”
Inflation...
